title: Importance of the Spiritual Lineage | Sri Madhu Pandit Dasa | ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.text: Devotees as spiritualists understand that this world is not illusion.
This world is a real world with a real purpose created by absolute real personality of Godhead, Krishna.
They see this world having a purpose and a plan in the mind of the Supreme Personality of Godhead
who is the creator of everything, maintainer of everything, annulator of everything.
The only perspective the Karmis have is enjoy life in this life, enjoy your senses, enjoy the body.
That is the only goal, which is completely self-centered.
So they don't have a plan, they don't have a...
Even if somebody says, we want to bring peace on earth, they cannot because they have to know
what is dharma, what is the design of the Supreme Personality of Godhead,
how the society should be organized, yajnas have to be performed.
And though we call ourselves civilized, but end of the day, the present population is not civilized.
Why? Because people who are engaged in sinful activities,
all these people, all these class of people are called dushkritinas.
Dushkritina means those who do sinful acts.
So today the earth is burdened by so much of sinful activities.
Sinful activities mean short-circuiting the design of the Lord, the plan of the Lord.
or the welfare of this world.
Draupad said that there will be a third world war.
Of course, once or twice he said that if Sankirtana spreads, then Sankirtana has the power to even prevent this.
But otherwise third world war is predicted.
Simply, simple logic that where would all these accumulated sin go and bursts?
It has to burst as a reaction. It has to come as a reaction.
Devotees and saintly persons are always anxious to see how the people can be made happy.
be both materially and spiritually. We know that the more and more Harinam spreads, more
and more Prasadam spreads, more and more the transcendental knowledge spreads in Prabhupada's
books. This is the highest welfare activity.
